name: Seele
story: A resident of the Underworld and the backbone of Wildfire. She goes by the alias "Babochka."She has a frank personality, but there is a delicate and sensitive hidden side to her deep in her heart.

skills.name: Thwack
skills.description: Deals minor Quantum DMG to a single enemy.

skills.name: Sheathed Blade
skills.description: Deals Quantum DMG to a single enemy and increases SPD.

skills.name: Butterfly Flurry
skills.description: Enters the buffed state and deals massive Quantum DMG to a single enemy.

skills.name: Resurgence
skills.description: Use Basic ATK, Skill, and Ultimate to defeat enemies, gain extra turns, and enter a buffed state. When in a buffed state, DMG dealt is increased.

skills.name: Phantom Illusion
skills.description: Enter Stealth mode. After attacking an enemy and entering battle, enter the buffed state.

eidolons.name: Extirpating Slash
eidolons.description: When dealing DMG to an enemy whose HP percentage is 80% or lower, CRIT Rate increases by 15%.

eidolons.name: Dancing Butterfly
eidolons.description: The SPD Boost effect of Seele's Skill can stack up to 2 time(s).

eidolons.name: Dazzling Tumult
eidolons.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Flitting Phantasm
eidolons.description: Seele regenerates 15 Energy when she defeats an enemy.

eidolons.name: Piercing Shards
eidolons.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: Shattering Shambles
eidolons.description: After Seele uses her Ultimate, inflict the target enemy with Butterfly Flurry for 1 turn(s). Enemies suffering from Butterfly Flurry will take Additional Quantum DMG equal to 15% of Seele's Ultimate DMG every time they are attacked. If the target enemy is defeated by the Butterfly Flurry DMG triggered by other allies' attacks, Seele's Talent will not be triggered.When Seele is knocked down, the Butterfly Flurry inflicted on the enemies will be removed.
